name: Super Space Fight With SPAAACESHIPS!
description:
In Super Space Fight With SPAAACESHIPS! as the name suggest, you play with cool spaceships (on space) and can kill your friends!

Not only that, but you can also brag about being better than your friends with the leader board!

  • WASD to Move
  • Left Click to Shoot
  • Mika, "Made the launcher look cool." - Artist.
  • Alef, "Made the whole game, and the usual rage." - Programmer.
  • Gui, "Moral support." - Programmer.
  • Raj, "Made the cute background." - Artist.
